report.title: NPMS My Visits 2
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for users to view their own data. Note: used by the Tracking The Impact project, not just NPMS.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations plot ON plot.id = csf.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN locations square ON square.id = plot.parent_id AND square.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName on lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=plot.id AND lavPlotName.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.created_by_id=#current_user# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) #order_by#

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

column.name: sample_1_id
column.sql: coalesce(case when (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0 then (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer ELSE NULL END,csf.id)

column.name: plot_name
column.sql: COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: case when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NOT NULL AND (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer != 0) THEN 'Survey 2' when ((csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer IS NULL OR (csnf.attrs_json->>'227')::integer = 0) THEN 'Survey 1' ELSE '' END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
